name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IGFo - Free IG Follower Export Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Instagram follower export Tool, export Instagram follower & following lists to CSV. Reliable, easy-to-use follower export for IG.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IGFo - IG Follower Export Tool automatically scrapes user profiles from Instagram followers and followings and export them to CSV. Completely free to use follower export for IG.🚀

▬▬▬▬▬Key Features▬▬▬▬▬
● Effortlessly export Instagram follower and following lists to CSV with just one click 📝
● Export user profiles, including follower count, following count. Followers or Following fields including numeric Instagram ID, username, full name, profile picture URL, and verification status 📚
● Keep track of all your scraped data with our History Manager. View, delete individual records, or clear all records effortlessly. 🕵️‍♂️
● User-friendly interface for easy data extraction 🛠️
● Local data processing ensures privacy and security 🔒

▬▬▬▬▬How to Use▬▬▬▬▬
1. Sign in to Instagram 📱
2. Open the extension 🚀
3. Input a valid IG username 👤
4. Choose to export followers or followings 📄
5. Click the export button to generate the CSV file automatically. After processing, download IG followers or followings to CSV.🖥️

▬▬▬▬▬Privacy & Security▬▬▬▬▬
● All data is processed locally on your computer 🖥️
● No data is stored on our servers 🗑️
● Control the frequency of use to avoid account restrictions ⏳

▬▬▬▬▬Disclaimer▬▬▬▬▬
● IGFo is an unofficial tool and not affiliated with Instagram 📝
